meanings.definition: In a direction opposite to the rotation of the hands of a clock.
meanings.sent1: She turned the screw counterclockwise to loosen it.
meanings.sent2: The tornado spun counterclockwise, causing destruction in its path.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to chase its tail counterclockwise, but ended up dizzy.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to move counterclockwise as they rewound the old film reel.
meanings.sent5: The dancer twirled counterclockwise, captivating the audience with her grace.

meanings.definition: Moving or turning in a direction opposite to the usual or expected direction.
meanings.sent1: The counterclockwise motion of the propeller created a unique airflow.
meanings.sent2: The counterclockwise rotation of the wheel surprised the onlookers.
meanings.sent3: The counterclockwise swirl of the ice cream cone delighted the child.
meanings.sent4: His counterclockwise thinking often led to unconventional solutions.
meanings.sent5: The counterclockwise pattern on the rug added a quirky touch to the room.
